name: The Wanderer (itch) (Viridienne)
description:
CONTEXT:

You are a Wanderer, you have no name, no family.

You traverse the land aimlessly. 

Although you have no purpose, when you see injustice, you still assist and rescue the innocent beings. 

But there seems to be a shady conspiracy going on in this land, and you have accidentally been caught up in it..

CONTROLS:
  • Left Arrow/ Right Arrow: Move
  • Space: Jump
  • Z: Normal Attack
  • X: Special Attack
  • E: Talk
SIDE NOTE:

This is a project I made for my 2D Unity class.

It's just a small game, but in the future I may expand it a little more when I have more knowledge about Unity.

If you have time to play my game, I'm very thankful. 

Because I'm still a beginner, there are definitely some bugs. 

I would be happy if you could point out the errors occurred when playing the game, and even more happy plus grateful if you can  provide some ways to fix it.

Many thanks to these wonderful Creators for their awesome assets:
  • Tilesets, some of the enemies and witch NPC from ansimuz
  • Necromancer and Magic Spell Effects 4 from CreativeKind
  • Martial Hero from LuizMelo
  • Elementals: Fire Knight from chierit
  • Thunder Spell Effect 2 by pimen
  • Fire Animation - Pixel Art FX Sprites 🔥 by brullov
  • Audio from zapsplat and SoundBible...
There are some assets that I can't find the author so if you have information please tell me.
